articles.author: Ron Dicker
articles.title: Cancer Patient Jane Marczewski Melts Simon Cowell With 'Stunning' Voice On 'America's Got Talent' - HuffPost
articles.description: The singer, who also goes by Nightbirde, got the Golden Buzzer amid a grim prognosis.
articles.content:
Jane Marczewski sang her heart out on Americas Got Talent Tuesday and melted judge Simon Cowells heart in the process. (Watch the video below.)
Cowell, fellow panelists and the audience were left ne… [+520 chars]

articles.title: ‘AGT’ judges floored by cancer patient’s gold buzzer performance — watch the video - Today.com
articles.description: Talented singer Nightbirde got her big break on Tuesday when “America’s Got Talent” judge Simon Cowell pushed the coveted golden buzzer for her performance, sending her through to the next round.
articles.content:
